title: Rerollius, God of Rerolls

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you roll this role, it's automatically rerolled and you get 2 extra rerolls, which bypass the rule that you can't reroll roles that you made. However, you lose one of these extra rerolls each time you reroll a role made by someone who isn't a player, even though those rerolls are normally free.
- If you somehow actually end up with this role, please note that you are immune to all effects which would change your role.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Reroll someone each night, rotating them 720 degrees, which causes them to be dealt a Powerful attack, but also changing their role to another random GIM role at the same time.

desc:
Post 1263
*The revolving god of randomness. His spinning wheels of gyration are swiveling.*
Roleblock, redirect, detection, and conversion immune
